part_description: Consists of two parts: a large gray section and a smaller black section, both rectangular and stacked, with the black part positioned on top.
internal_interaction_description: The gray section serves as the main body, providing structure and bulk, while the black section is designed for precise erasing. The black part is slightly elevated, allowing for easy grip and control during use.
external_interaction_description: The eraser interacts with paper and pencil marks, removing graphite by friction. It is held by hand, with the user applying pressure and movement to erase unwanted marks, making it a common tool in writing and drawing tasks.
